ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: The authors would like to thank the New Use Agriculture and Natural Plant Products Program and the New Jersey Agricultural Experiment Station Hatch Project NJ12158 which provided funding for this work. We also thank Ed Dager, Mark Peacos and Harna Patel for their assistance in the field and greenhouse production of the catnip samples. The authors would also like to thank Chris Bainter at FLIRÂ® Systems for his assistance in the project. We also thank Eric and Clancy Goodkind, as this project would not have been possible without their hospitality. Finally, we would like to thank Walter and Barbara Reichert for their continual support.
